name: $named-event
desc: The trigger occurs at a specific time or periodically as described by a timing or schedule. A periodic event cannot have any data elements, but may have a name assigned as a shorthand for the event.

name: $periodic
desc: The trigger occurs whenever data of a particular type is changed in any way, either added, modified, or removed.

name: $data-changed
desc: The trigger occurs whenever data of a particular type is accessed.

name: $data-accessed
desc: The trigger occurs whenever access to data of a particular type is completed.
